title: Tyga hints Kylie Jenner is lying about Travis Scott split as he breaks silence on 2am date
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Tyga has broken his silence over ex girlfriend Kylie Jenner 's split from Travis Scott .

The rapper, real name Michael Stevenson, threw shade at the billionaire makeup mogul and hinted that she was lying about what really happened with that 2am recording studio date.

Jenner took to Twitter on Wednesday to confirm she and Travis had broken up, writing: "The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is.

"There was no "2am date with Tyga". You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

But Tyga responded less than an hour after the Kardashian sister released her statement.

The Taste hitmaker simply posted a blue cap emoji, which can symbolise someone is "cappin", or lying.

Cappin is defined by the Urban Dictionary as "frontin" - saying stuff that isn't true.

However billionaire Kylie insists she was simply providing a lift for her friends to the studio.

(Image: Instagram)

She confirmed that she and Travis are on "great terms" and that their main focus right now is daughter Stormi, who is one.

The 22-year-old wrote: "Travis and i are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi. Our friendship and our daughter is priority."

Since Tyga's shady posts, Kylie has continued with life as normal, posting on Instagram with snaps of herself in an Adidas tracksuit, and Instagram stories of Stormi.

(Image: Getty Images North America)

(Image: FilmMagic)

But now fans are speculating that Travis is not so innocent, and that 27-year-old model Rojean Kar is the reason behind their split.

Rojean goes by the name of YungSweetRo on Instagram, and has been long linked to the rapper.

She even attended his birthday party in April, which was thrown for him by Kylie.

Fans are speculating that the Calabasas-based model has flaunted her connection with Travis on social media by regularly posting pictures that hint she's in the same location as him.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Back in March, it's said that she tagged Kylie in a post to reveal the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star had blocked her.

She wrote, "How many times a day do you block & unblock me girl," following it up with laughter emojis.

Mirror Online has contacted Tyga and Kylie for comment.
description: The ex-boyfriend of Kylie Jenner has finally broken his silence over her split from Travis Scott - and hinted his ex was lying about her denial of their date
